protocol.name: P-GSE21504-2
protocol.text: Plants in the low oxygen treatment group were placed in anaerobic microbial chambers (Oxoid, Adelaide, SA, Australia) and the chambers were flushed with a gas mixture of 0.1% oxygen, balance nitrogen at a flow rate of ~10L/min. for 20 minutes. Chambers were then sealed, and plants were left in the 0.1% oxygen atmosphere for five hours. Plants in the control group were placed in cannisters that were left unsealed.

protocol.name: P-GSE21504-3
protocol.text: Plants were kept in a growth room at 22Â°C with a day:night period of 16:8-hrs and fluorescent lighting levels of ~75uE. Plants were grown on MS media with 3% sucrose and 0.8% agar and transferred to liquid MS media containing 3% sucrose one day prior to sampling.

protocol.name: P-GSE21504-4
protocol.text: Root tissue was excised from plants and was flash frozen and ground in liquid nitrogen. Trizol extraction of total RNA was performed according to the manufacturer's instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE21504-5
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 7 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-GSE21504-6
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, cRNA was hybridized to the ATH1 Arabidopsis Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.

protocol.name: P-GSE21504-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix GeneChip scanner 3000 7G.

protocol.name: P-GSE21504-8
protocol.text: The data was analysed using the limma Bioconductor package in R. Array data was normalized using the EXPRESSO function (Gautier et al., 2005). A robust multi-chip average was calculated using quantile normalization, background correction and the median polish method as recommended by (Bolstad et al., 2003) and (Irizarry et al., 2003).
